Uses of Package
io.atomix.catalyst.util

  • Packages that use io.atomix.catalyst.util 
    Package Description
    io.atomix.catalyst.buffer
    Provides a low-level Buffer abstraction backed by on- or off-heap memory, memory mapped files, or RandomAccessFile.
    io.atomix.catalyst.transport
    The Transport layer provides a low-level interface via which Catalyst clients and servers communicate.
    io.atomix.catalyst.util
    Generic utilities for managing object lifecycles.
  • Classes in io.atomix.catalyst.util used by io.atomix.catalyst.buffer 
    Class and Description
    ReferenceCounted
    Reference counting interface.
    ReferenceFactory
    Reference factory.
    ReferenceManager
    Reference manager.
    ReferencePool
    Pool of reference counted objects.
  • Classes in io.atomix.catalyst.util used by io.atomix.catalyst.transport 
    Class and Description
    Listener
    Context for unregistering a registered listener.
  • Classes in io.atomix.catalyst.util used by io.atomix.catalyst.util 
    Class and Description
    Listener
    Context for unregistering a registered listener.
    PropertiesReader
    Utility for reading configuration information from properties.
    ReferenceCounted
    Reference counting interface.
    ReferenceFactory
